feed.title: PortChecker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • portchecker.io version 3 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/234
  • Remove cosign from image builds by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/235
  • Fix docs link in readme by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/236
  • Fix nginx proxy for api by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/237

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v2.0.1...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add more dependabot update rules by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/238
  • Improve documentation by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/241
  • [api] Bump gunicorn from 22.0.0 to 23.0.0 in /backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/240
  • Exception handling improvements by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/242
  • Bring API up to Isort and Pylint standards by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/243
  • Add Pytests to API by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/244
  • GitHub action pytest by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/245
  • Add GitHub Actions workflow for Pylint by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/246
  • Add GitHub Actions job for isort by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/247
  • Enable backend paths for api workflow by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/249
  • Deduplicate application info by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/248
  • Fix issue where project.toml was missing from containers by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/250
  • Only run GitHub workflows once by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/251
  • Add docstrings to pytests by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/252
  • Add coverage reporting for Pytest by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/253
  • Add favicon to web by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/254
  • Bump release 3.1.0 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/255

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix incorrect defaults for env vars in README by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/256
  • Add threading to socket check by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/257
  • Make DEFAULT_PORT environment variable work for static UI image" by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/258
  • Use the new API endpoint in the UI by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/259
  • Remove unused Google Adsense environment variable by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/260
  • [web] Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /frontend/web by @dependabot in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/261
  • Add docs endpoint to webpack dev proxy by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/262
  • Bump release 3.1.1 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/263

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update CodeQL workflow by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/264
  • Fix web container where volume mounts are used by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/266

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.1.1...v3.1.2

entry.title: New release for PortChecker: v3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add sponsorship button to repository by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/267
  • Make method name more representative of its task by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/268
  • Correct docstrings and incorrect typehints by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/269
  • Make docker-compose files more complete by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/270
  • Add spotlight section to README by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/271
  • JavaScript refactor and lint checking by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/272
  • Add DB Tech YouTube video to spotlight section of README by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/273
  • Fix issue where the ALLOW_PRIVATE env var was not being evaluated correctly by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/274
  • Make the query message update the host on submit by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/275
  • Add pre-commit hook by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/278
  • Make pre-commit hook fail fast by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/279
  • Update API dependencies by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/280
  • Docker improvements by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/281
  • Bump release v3.2.0 by @dsgnr in https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/pull/282

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dsgnr/portchecker.io/compare/v3.1.2...v3.2.0
